body.p:
Cynthiana April 8th 1865
Gov. Thos. E. Bramlett

Dr Sir I am requested by.C. Walten Judge Broadwell and other provisional Citizens of Cynthiana to ask you to defer any action as to Commission of Mayor of the city until Mr Land's side of the case shall be presented: it is understood that Mr Mart in the unsuccessful Candidate has been moving in the matter: Mr Land only wants to ^be^ fairly dealt by in the premises: he received a wound in the fight against John Morgans forces which has made him a Cripple for life: & the Citizens generally seem dissatisfied with the form of the city Government & propose to petition for the repeal of the charter at the adjourned session in May next
